sentences.en: You're resurrected with cybernetics and nanotechnology so that you can go on a suicide mission to discover why colonies of humans are disappearing.
sentences.cn: 你在神经机械学和纳米技术下复活，让你能够执行一个自杀任务，去发现为什么人类殖民地在消失。

sentences.en: Some futurists envision nanotechnology also being used to explore the deep sea in small submarine, or even to launch finger-sized rockets packed with micro miniature instruments.
sentences.cn: 一些未来学家设想纳米技术也可以用于在小型潜水艇里探索深海，甚至可以用来发射装有微型仪器的手指大小的火箭。

sentences.en: See nanotechnology and nanotoxicology for additional information.
sentences.cn: 有关其他信息，请参见纳米技术和纳米毒理学。
